properties.areaDesc: Columbia, PA; Lycoming, PA; Northumberland, PA; Union, PA; Montour, PA
properties.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued January 8 at 6:44AM EST until January 8 at 7:30AM EST by NWS State College PA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a

* Snow Squall Warning for...
Northern Northumberland County in central Pennsylvania...
Southeastern Lycoming County in north central Pennsylvania...
Montour County in central Pennsylvania...
Columbia County in central Pennsylvania...
Southeastern Union County in central Pennsylvania...

* Until 730 AM EST.

* At 644 AM EST, a dangerous snow squall was located along a line
extending from Jamison City to Mifflinburg, moving east at 45 mph.

HAZARD...Extremely poor visibility in snow and blowing snow. Wind
gusts up to 30 mph. Icy roadways.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect hazardous road conditions.

* For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the
Mile Run and Nescopek exits, specifically from mile markers 207 to
247.

This includes Interstate 180 from mile markers 1 to 6.

Locations impacted include...
Bloomsburg, Berwick, Sunbury, Milton, Lewisburg, Danville,
Northumberland, Mifflinburg, Winfield, Watsontown, Elysburg,
Riverside, Catawissa, Linntown, Mifflinville, Lightstreet, Almedia,
New Columbia, Montandon and Fernville.
properties.instruction:
Consider avoiding or delaying travel until the snow squall passes
your location. If you must travel, use extra caution and allow extra
time. Rapid changes in visibility and slick road conditions may lead
to accidents.

CMAMtext: Snow Squall Warning til 7:30 AM EST. Sudden whiteouts. Icy roads. Slow down! -NWS
